Title: Ora facciamo i Conte
Writer: Stefano Bises (creator), Leonardo Fasoli (creator), Leonardo Fasoli (screenplay), Leonardo Fasoli (story), Maddalena Ravagli (screenplay), Roberto Saviano (creator)
Actors: Salvatore Esposito, Walter Lippa, Domenico Balsamo, Maria Pia Calzone
Plot: Major bloodshed is imminent as Conte returns to Naples to avenge Giuliano's murder, and Ciro tries to distract him from the coup he is plotting. Daniele's mother visits Imma and begs for ...
